meanings.definition: A plant of the valerian family with small white flowers, believed to have healing properties.
meanings.sent1: The allheal plant is known for its small white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some allheal in my garden to help with healing.
meanings.sent3: The allheal plant and its healing powers saved the day in the story.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an allheal, bringing comfort to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The allheal's healing properties were so potent, they seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: To heal or cure all ailments.
meanings.sent1: She used her skills to allheal the wounds of the injured animals.
meanings.sent2: Doctors strive to allheal their patients with care and expertise.
meanings.sent3: He tried to allheal his broken toy with tape, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the power to allheal the emotional pain of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The music seemed to allheal the sadness in the room, bringing smiles to everyone.
